languages.text: "Слыхали. Байка это. Смеющий гонщик, убивающий бродяг! Чушь!"
"I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"
languages.original_text: "Слыхали. Байка это. Смеющий гонщик, убивающий бродяг! Чушь!"

traits.locale_text: "Sure did. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"
"Sure did. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"
"I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"
"I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"
"I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"

languages.text: “我听说过，都是无稽之谈。什么狂笑杀手，什么专杀流浪汉的家伙！简直是胡说八道！”
languages.original_text: "I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: “我听说过，都是无稽之谈。什么狂笑杀手，什么专杀流浪汉的家伙！简直是胡说八道！”

languages.text: 「ああ、あるよ。ほら話だろ。笑う競走者、放浪者の殺戮者！馬鹿らしい！」
languages.original_text: "I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、あるよ。ほら話だろ。笑う競走者、放浪者の殺戮者！馬鹿らしい！」

languages.text: « Oui, ce n'est qu'une histoire à dormir debout. Le coureur ricanant, le tueur de vagabonds ! C'est absurde ! »
languages.original_text: "I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: « Oui, ce n'est qu'une histoire à dormir debout. Le coureur ricanant, le tueur de vagabonds ! C'est absurde ! »

languages.text: «Sí, pero es una trola. ¿El corredor que ríe? ¿El asesino de los vagabundos? ¡Menuda sarta de sandeces!».
languages.original_text: "I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: «Sí, pero es una trola. ¿El corredor que ríe? ¿El asesino de los vagabundos? ¡Menuda sarta de sandeces!».

languages.text: "Habe ich tatsächlich. Das ist nur eine Geschichte. Der Lachende Raser, Tod aller Vagabunden! Unsinn!"
languages.original_text: "I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: "Habe ich tatsächlich. Das ist nur eine Geschichte. Der Lachende Raser, Tod aller Vagabunden! Unsinn!"

languages.text: "Çalındı, evet. Palavra be. İpsizlerin katili Gülen Gladyatör'müş! Zırvanın daniskası!"
languages.original_text: "I have indeed. It's a tall tale. The Laughing Racer, killer of vagabonds! Nonsense!"

traits.locale_text: "Çalındı, evet. Palavradan ibaret. Şen Gladyatör, ipsizlerin katili! Zırvanın daniskası!"
